dialogues.text: Good. The next time I see you, you'll be all in black.
dialogues.speaker: Robb Stark

dialogues.text: It was always my color. How long do you think it will be?
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Soon enough. Farewell, Snow.
dialogues.speaker: Robb Stark

dialogues.text: And you, Stark. Take care of Bran.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: I will. Uncle Benjen said to send you to the stables if I saw you.
dialogues.speaker: Robb Stark

dialogues.text: I have one more farewell to make.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Then I haven't seen you.
dialogues.speaker: Robb Stark

dialogues.text: I was afraid you were gone. They wouldn't let me out to say good-bye.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: What did you do now?
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Nothing. I was all packed and everything. Septa Mordane says I have to do it all over. My things weren't properly folded, she says. A proper southron lady doesn't just throw her clothes inside her chest like old rags, she says.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Is that what you did, little sister?
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Well, they're going to get all messed up anyway. Who cares how they're folded?
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Septa Mordane. I don't think she'd like Nymeria helping, either. It's just as well. I have something for you to take with you, and it has to be packed very carefully.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: A present?
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: You could call it that. Close the door.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Nymeria, here. Guard.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: A sword.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself. The edges are sharp enough to shave with.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Girls don't shave.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Maybe they should. Have you ever seen the septa's legs?
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: It's so skinny.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: So are you. I had Mikken make this special. The bravos use swords like this in Pentos and Myr and the other Free Cities. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're fast enough.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: I can be fast.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: I think so.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: First lesson. Stick them with the pointy end.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: I know which end to use. Septa Mordane will take it away from me.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Not if she doesn't know you have it.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Who will I practice with?
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: You'll find someone. King's Landing is a true city, a thousand times the size of Winterfell. Until you find a partner, watch how they fight in the yard. Run, and ride, make yourself strong. And whatever you do…
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: …don't… tell… Sansa!
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: …don't… tell… Sansa!
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: I will miss you, little sister.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: I wish you were coming with us.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle. Who knows? I better go. I'll spend my first year on the Wall emptying chamber pots if I keep Uncle Ben waiting any longer.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Put down the sword first.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: I almost forgot. All the best swords have names.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Like Ice. Does this have a name? Oh, tell me.
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Can't you guess? Your very favorite thing.
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow

dialogues.text: Needle!
dialogues.speaker: Arya Stark

dialogues.text: Needle!
dialogues.speaker: Jon Snow
